about.details:
Incorporated in 2013, Gujarat based Latteys Industries Limited is a company engaged in the business of manufacturing of pumping solutions for homes, agriculture & industrial sectors. Pumps include Submersible, Self-Priming, Centrifugal, Shallow and Horizontal Pumps. The Company manufactures more than 700 models of pumps as its portfolio. These pumps are widely used by Domestic and Industrial sectors.

Latteys Industries started manufacturing in the year 2004 in Chatraal, Gujarat and moved to a strategic location of GIDC Naroda, Gujarat with an area of 5,718 sq. meters in the year 2011. The Company currently has an installed production capacity of 1,59,500 pumps p.a. It has 76 employees at its manufacturing facility and registered office.

faqs.question: What is the Latteys Industries IPO?
faqs.answer:
Latteys Industries IPO is a SME IPO of 1222000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹8.06 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹66 per share. The minimum order quantity is 2000.

The IPO opens on May 23, 2018, and closes on May 28, 2018.

Link Intime India Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Latteys Industries IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Latteys Industries IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Latteys Industries IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Latteys Industries IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Latteys Industries IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Latteys Industries IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Latteys Industries IPO opens on May 23, 2018 and closes on May 28, 2018.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Latteys Industries IPO?
faqs.answer: Latteys Industries IPO lot size is 2000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,32,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Latteys Industries IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Latteys Industries IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.
